constraints.description: Body text must start at 4.6 cm (C2)
Header must contain image on left and fixed date on right
Footer must contain name on left and page numbering on right
Page numbering format must be 'page x (y)'
Must replace paragraph numbers (1, 2, 3) with descriptive subheadings
Must add brief description of TIEKE qualifications at the end
Must save as RTF or DOCX format
Must remove unnecessary line breaks and blank lines
Must check that paragraphs don't break untidily across pages

metadata.title: Exercise: Document Formatting (Word/Writer)
metadata.description: Assignment guiding the creation and formatting of a professional document according to specific instructions
